name: Super Mario 8
description:
NES Demake Of Super Mario 64 That Was Made For Coffee Bat's Demake Jam.

This is literally the first game I have ever released so cut me some slack lol.

Controls:

Left & Right Arrow -> Move

Z -> Jump

X -> Dive (While moving or in the air)

Down Arrow -> Crouch

Crouch + Jump -> Long Jump

Crouch Midair -> Ground Pound
